title: Chapter 2299
body:
Chapter 2299

Yuan Linning cultivated one of Meng Po Palace’s loftiest inheritances, the Heavenchill Netherworld Flame Sutra. She’d mastered the top-notch power of Netherworld Iceflames, and even a casual attack could encase living things and entire landscapes in ice.

After proving her Dao and becoming an Emperor, she was called the Iceflame Netherworld Empress.

Cui Jingyan and the old blind man were both alarmed.

This was the power of the Imperial Realm!

Just one attack, yet she seemed like a deity in control of the entire landscape and all its facets, emanating limitless power.

Just as the blade of light was about to descend—

Bang!

The dense layer of frost covering Su Yi burst apart.

Practically simultaneously, Abstruse Celestial rose through the air, like the river of heaven flowing in reverse. It just barely managed to block the descending snowy light.

Crunch!

The three-foot light blade split down the middle.

Su Yi’s indomitable sword qi struck like an angry dragon overturning the seas. The nearby landscape rumbled, recovering from its frozen state.

As if a sword dancing throughout the landscape had broken ten thousand feet of ice!

This scene left both Cui Jingyan and the old blind man s...
original_title: Chapter 786 - Defeating an Imperial Expert With His Sword
